marklogic.body: Coming this fall... the terrifying sequel to the most horrifying, depraved and mind-scarring of all My Little Pony Fanfictions ever to Equestria Daily. TACOS - "Trixie? What are you doing in my house?" Twilight said, her voice trembling as the blue mare slowly shambled towards her, a meat grinder floating gently in her magical blue aura. "Oh, Sparkle" The great and powerful mare crooned softly, drawing herself up close to the shaking purple filly. "Don't you know?" Twilight suddenly gagged as she felt Trixie's magic aura wrapping around her throat, all oxygen being cut ... "...Nobody neighsays the great and powerful Trixie... and lives..." - Spike slowly pushed open the cracked door to Carousel Boutique. "R-Rarity?" he stammered. Something was very wrong. Rarity's fabric was strewn all over the place. Curtains were torn down Off the walls and Rarity's ponyquins were knocked over. If Spike didn't know better, he'd say there had been a struggle. But who would attack Rarity? "Rarity?" He tried to call out for his beloved mare again when he suddenly stopped, a 'squeltch' sound echoing through the room and a soggy feeling permeating through his footclaw. Spike jumped back to see what he had stepped in... ...A pool of blood. - "Y'all will never get away with this, Trixie?! Ya hear?!" Applejack yelled as she dangled in Trixie's magical aura, held aloft over the spinning blades of the grinder. "Oh little Hayseed... So blind to the truth. Why don't you know?" Trixie chuckled, switching on a light, only to reveal two horns and a pair of wings, displayed neatly on a mantlepiece. Applejack nearly Vomited at the sight of them. "I already have... Mwahaha... MWAHAHAHAHAHA!!!" - The pink pony's mouth cracked into a twisted grin, her teeth stained with blood... "I have taught you well... my faithful student..." - All you have to do is take a ripe tomato dice it up like this... Now just take a taco shell, some cheese and onion, some sour cream just a titch... TACOS Coming soon to a fanfiction near you...
